---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case

Describe the problem or workflow this feature would address.

**Example**: "As a NetSuite administrator, I want to sync vendor bills so that I can manage all payables in Billabex."

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you'd like this feature to work.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context

- Does this affect existing functionality?
- Are there any NetSuite limitations to consider?
- Links to relevant Billabex API documentation (if applicable)

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I'm willing to submit a PR for this feature
- [ ] I can help test this feature in my sandbox
- [ ] I can provide sample data or use cases for testing
